column1: Avoid walking or driving through floodwaters.
Secure loose objects and stay indoors during a cyclone.
Stay hydrated and avoid going outside during a heatwave.
Move to higher ground immediately if a tsunami warning is issued.
In case of a landslide, evacuate the area and avoid river valleys.
Have an emergency kit ready with food, water, and first aid.
Stay tuned to official weather alerts and advisories.
Drop, cover, and hold on during an earthquake.
